title: Is saying Sadaqa Allahu al atheem after reciting Quran authentic? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: a lot of the muslims have the wrong understanding after concluding reading the quran for example so they say and this is closer to an innovation rather than a good deed it was never done by the prophet sallam nor his companions yet you hear it from 99 percent of the muslims on radio stations famous reciters concluding the recitation of the quran and saying allah and this is an innovation
